specialRules.hint: Whenever this unit takes a morale test it is passed automatically. Then roll as many dice as remaining models/tough in the unit, and for each result of 1-2 the unit takes one wound, which can’t be regenerated.
specialRules.name: Automa
specialRules.label: Automa
specialRules.description: Whenever this unit takes a morale test it is passed automatically. Then roll as many dice as remaining models/tough in the unit, and for each result of 1-2 the unit takes one wound, which can’t be regenerated.

specialRules.hint: When the hero is activated pick one friendly Artillery unit within 6”, which may either get +2 to its shooting rolls or move up to 6” during its next activation.
specialRules.name: Ballistic Master
specialRules.label: Ballistic Master
specialRules.description: When the hero is activated pick one friendly Artillery unit within 6”, which may either get +2 to its shooting rolls or move up to 6” during its next activation.

specialRules.hint: When the hero and his unit are activated pick one of the following orders, and they get one of these special rules until the end of the round: • At the Double: +3” when moving.
specialRules.name: Captain
specialRules.label: Captain
specialRules.description: When the hero and his unit are activated pick one of the following orders, and they get one of these special rules until the end of the round: • At the Double: +3” when moving.

specialRules.hint: Once per turn, if within 2” of a unit with Tough, roll one die. On a 2+ you may repair 1 wound from the target.
specialRules.name: Repair
specialRules.label: Repair
specialRules.description: Once per turn, if within 2” of a unit with Tough, roll one die. On a 2+ you may repair 1 wound from the target.

specialRules.hint: When this unit is activated pick one enemy unit within 12”. The next friendly unit that shoots at it gets +1 to hit rolls.
specialRules.name: Signal Flare
specialRules.label: Signal Flare
specialRules.description: When this unit is activated pick one enemy unit within 12”. The next friendly unit that shoots at it gets +1 to hit rolls.

specialRules.hint: When in melee, may pick one model from the enemy unit and roll one die. On a 2+ it takes 1 hit with Deadly(3).
specialRules.name: Takedown
specialRules.label: Takedown
specialRules.description: When in melee, may pick one model from the enemy unit and roll one die. On a 2+ it takes 1 hit with Deadly(3).

specialRules.hint: When this model fights in melee roll one die and apply one bonus: • 1-3: Unit gets AP(+1).
specialRules.name: Trickster
specialRules.label: Trickster
specialRules.description: When this model fights in melee roll one die and apply one bonus: • 1-3: Unit gets AP(+1).

specialRules.hint: Whenever this unit moves over enemies pick one of them and roll 1 die, on a 2+ it takes 3 hits with AP(1).
specialRules.name: Drop Bombs
specialRules.label: Drop Bombs
specialRules.description: Whenever this unit moves over enemies pick one of them and roll 1 die, on a 2+ it takes 3 hits with AP(1).

specialRules.hint: This model counts as having the Fear special rule, and gets +4 to its Fear rolls.
specialRules.name: Terrifying
specialRules.label: Terrifying
specialRules.description: This model counts as having the Fear special rule, and gets +4 to its Fear rolls.

specialRules.hint: This model may transport up to X models. Units embark by moving into contact and may use any action to disembark but only move by 6”. Units may also be deployed within a transport. If a unit is inside a transport when it’s destroyed then it must take a Dangerous Terrain test, is immediately Wavering, and surviving models must be placed within 6” of the transport before it’s removed from play.
specialRules.name: Transport(X)
specialRules.label: Transport(X)
specialRules.description: This model may transport up to X models. Units embark by moving into contact and may use any action to disembark but only move by 6”. Units may also be deployed within a transport. If a unit is inside a transport when it’s destroyed then it must take a Dangerous Terrain test, is immediately Wavering, and surviving models must be placed within 6” of the transport before it’s removed from play.

spells.name: Fury Herbs
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets Furious next time it charges.

spells.name: Choking Fog
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 3 automatic hits with AP(1).

spells.name: Clearview Leaves
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets +6” range next time it shoots.

spells.name: Deep Rot
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 1 hit with AP(4) and Deadly(3).

spells.name: Mesmer Oils
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” must take a morale test. If failed you may force it to charge another enemy unit.

spells.name: Neurotoxin Gas
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 6” takes 1 automatic hit per model.
